game.name: GetOffWork
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 창작마당, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: GetOffWork is a pixel puzzle game with racing and puzzle elements. There are more than 100 levels inside, and players can also make their own levels and share them with others to play.
game.shortDescriptionEn: GetOffWork is a pixel puzzle game with racing and puzzle elements. There are more than 100 levels inside, and players can also make their own levels and share them with others to play.
